## Features


+ Define Dynamic Computing-Graph
+ Define Neural Network Operator 
+ Define Linear,Sigmoid, L2_loss
+ Auto-Diff Computing
+ Auto-Feedforward and Backword

## Remain

+ Classification
+ Cross-Entropy
+ CNN,RNN
